title: Are vocation and mission related? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course. It depends on the context. Are you speaking in a religious or secular sense. For instance, religious institutions engage in “missions and outreach”, but every corporation has a “mission statement” that its people are supposed to know and live by. Vocation tends to be a broader term: it refers both to a person’s religious vocation and to one’s practical professional vocation, such as teacher, carpenter, mechanic, plumber, businessman or woman, etc.
